desc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>981 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>3秒 攻击方式：以抛物线发射榴弹攻击敌人，榴弹会在敌人附近地面爆炸并造成范围<@ba.fire>灼热伤害。
desc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>981 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>3s Mode of Attack: Launches grenades in a ballistic trajectory. The grenades detonate above ground near enemies and deal area of effect <@ba.fire>Heat DMG.

desc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>5585 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>3秒 攻击方式：以抛物线发射Ⅱ级榴弹攻击敌人，榴弹会在敌人附近地面爆炸并造成范围<@ba.fire>灼热伤害，同时在地面留下一片燃烧区域对敌人造成伤害。
desc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>5585 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>3s Mode of Attack: Attacks enemies by launching Mk Ⅱ grenades along a ballistic trajectory that detonate above ground near enemies. The grenade explosion deals area of effect <@ba.fire>Heat DMG and leaves a burning zone that deals DMG to enemies within it.

desc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>5485 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：发射特制毒雾弹，毒雾弹会在敌人附近地面爆炸并造成范围<@ba.natur>自然伤害，同时在地面留下一片毒雾区，对范围内的敌人造成伤害并降低移动速度。
desc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>5485 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Launches special mist grenades that detonate above ground near enemies. The mist grenade explosion deals area of effect <@ba.natur>Nature DMG and leaves a mist zone that deals DMG and slows the movement speed of enemies within the area of effect.

desc.cn: 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：发射特殊液氮晶体，晶体爆裂后会降低范围内敌人的移动速度。
desc.en: Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Fires special liquid nitrogen (LN) crystals that shatter upon impact to slow the movement speed of enemies in the area of effect.

desc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>22338 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>8秒 攻击方式：消耗大量充能向目标发射射线，对敌人造成高额<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害。
desc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>22338 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>8s Mode of Attack: Consumes vast amounts of energy to emit a beam that deals massive <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG to enemies.

desc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>4886 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>3秒 攻击方式：释放电能攻击敌人，攻击会弹射到附近敌人（至多2次），造成<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害。
desc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>4886 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>3s Mode of Attack: Releases electrical arcs that attack enemies. The arc also chains to nearby enemies (up to 2) and deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG.

desc.cn: 最小治疗间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 可将充能转化为治疗量，治疗周围受伤的干员。
desc.en: Minimum HP Treatment Interval: <@ba.key>5s Converts electrical power into healing arts that can treat injured operators nearby.

desc.cn: 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：发射一道震荡波，对范围内的普通敌人和进阶敌人施加<@ba.vdown>晕眩效果。
desc.en: Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Fires a shockwave that <@ba.vdown>stuns common and advanced enemies within the area of effect.

desc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>11634 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>5秒 攻击方式：拥有较大攻击范围，优先锁定范围内威胁更高的敌人，对敌人造成高额<@ba.phy>物理伤害。
desc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>11634 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>5s Mode of Attack: Unleashes long-range attacks that target high-threat enemies first and deal massive <@ba.phy>Physical DMG.

desc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>609 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>2秒 攻击方式：持续发射能量弹，对敌人造成<@ba.phy>物理伤害。
desc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>609 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>2s Mode of Attack: Continuously fires energy bolts that deal <@ba.phy>Physical DMG.

desc.cn: 攻击力：<@ba.key>2136 攻击间隔：<@ba.key>2秒 攻击方式：持续发射Ⅱ级能量弹，每第4次攻击会发射一次强力能量弹，对敌人造成<@ba.phy>物理伤害。
desc.en: ATK: <@ba.key>2136 Attack Interval: <@ba.key>2s Mode of Attack: Continuously fires Mk II energy bolts with every 4th shot being an empowered bolt. The bolts deal <@ba.phy>Physical DMG.

desc.cn: 用于便捷存取仓库物品的设备。
desc.en: A facility that allows quick access of items in the Depot.

desc.cn: 能够加工各式零件的平台。
desc.en: A facility capable of processing various parts and components.

desc.cn: 用于进行物理分拆的设备。
desc.en: A facility that physically separates various items.

desc.cn: 用于供给液体的设备。
desc.en: A facility for dispensing fluids.

desc.cn: 用于供给液体的设备。
desc.en: A facility for dispensing fluids.

desc.cn: 能够将原料灌装到容器的设备。
desc.en: A facility capable of filling containers with various materials.

desc.cn: 使用高温熔炼其他材料的设备。
desc.en: A facility that performs high temperature smelting of various materials.

desc.cn: 使用高温熔炼其他材料的设备。
desc.en: A facility that performs high temperature smelting of various materials.

desc.cn: 能粉碎各种材料的重型设备。
desc.en: A heavy facility that shreds and pulverizes various materials.

desc.cn: 存储液体的设备。
desc.en: A facility for storing fluids.

desc.cn: 存储液体的设备。
desc.en: A facility for storing fluids.

desc.cn: 可将物品运送至当地仓库的活动端口，只能贴靠仓库存取线放置。
desc.en: A placeable loading point that delivers goods from the AIC Factory to a local depot. The Depot Loader must be placed right next to the Depot Bus.

desc.cn: 可以在集成核心区域放置的仓库存取线基段，需要和仓库存取线源桩或其他生效的仓库存取线基段相连，其上可贴靠仓库存货口和仓库取货口。
desc.en: A bus section that can be deployed in the Core AIC Area. The Depot Bus Section must be connected to a Depot Bus Port or other active Depot Bus Sections. Once active, Depot Loaders and Depot Unloaders can be attached to the Depot Bus.

desc.cn: 作为仓库存取线的起始点，可以在集成核心区域自由放置。
desc.en: The origin of the Depot Bus. The Depot Bus Port can be placed anywhere in the Core AIC Area.

desc.cn: 用于留下标记信息的设备。
desc.en: A facility that can be used to post and leave beacon memos.

desc.cn: 用来开采源矿的机械设备，可使用源石完成自供能，不需要通电就可以运作。
desc.en: A mining rig for digging up Originium Ore. This rig does not need to be connected to the power grid to work as it powers itself using the Originium it mines.

desc.cn: 在通电状态下，可以用来开采源矿、类晶石的机械设备。
desc.en: Requires power. This mining rig can mine Originium Ore and Krystallite.

desc.cn: 在通电状态下，可以用来开采蓝铁矿等多种矿物的机械设备。
desc.en: Requires power. This mining rig can mine Ferrium Ore and other minerals.

desc.cn: 进行固液体化学反应的设备。
desc.en: A facility for running solid or liquid-state chemical reactions.

desc.cn: 能够培育各类普通植物的仓形设备。
desc.en: A silo for growing various common plants and crops.

desc.cn:
通电后可给较大范围内的终末地设备无线供电。
完成后续工业计划研发后可进行30m内短距离电力运输。
desc.en: Once connected to the power grid, this pylon can wirelessly power all Endfield facilities within a sizable area. Researching certain AIC Factory Plan technologies also gives this facility a 30-meter power transmission capability.

desc.cn: 在集成核心区域外可自动连接协议核心与息壤中继器（80m内）、息壤供电桩以及其他电力设备（30m内），但无法连接核心区域内的其他电力设备。在集成核心区域内仅会自动连接协议核心。可进行范围供电与短距离电力传输。
desc.en: When outside the Core AIC Area, this facility auto-connects to the PAC and Xiranite Relays within an 80-meter radius; and to Xiranite Pylons and other power facilities within a 30-meter radius. However, it cannot connect to other power facilities within the Core AIC Area. When inside the Core AIC Area, it only auto-connects to the PAC. This facility can be used for powering facilities within range and power transmission across short distances.

desc.cn:
可以在80m范围内完成电力配给的中继设备，只能进行电力传输。
完成后续工业计划研发后可给小范围内的终末地设备无线供电。
desc.en: This relay can be used to transmit power to other facilities within an 80-meter radius. Researching certain AIC Factory Plan technologies also lets this facility wirelessly supply power to other Endfield facilities within a small area.

desc.cn: 在集成核心区域外可自动连接协议核心与全部息壤电力设备（80m内），但无法连接核心区域内的其他电力设备。在集成核心区域内仅会自动连接协议核心。可进行电力传输与小范围供电。
desc.en: When outside the Core AIC Area, this facility auto-connects to the PAC and any Xiranite power facilities within an 80-meter radius. However, it cannot connect to other power facilities within the Core AIC Area. When inside the Core AIC Area, it only auto-connects to the PAC. This facility can be used for power transmission and powering facilities within a short range.

desc.cn: 作为电路末端的终端中继器。
desc.en: An electric nexus is usually deployed at the end of a power transmission line.

desc.cn: 提供电能的热能转化设备，只有接入电网才能生效。
desc.en: The Thermal Bank converts heat into electrical power. It must be connected to the power grid to work.

desc.cn: 用于抽取液体的设备。
desc.en: A facility for pumping fluids.

desc.cn: 能够采集普通植物种子的设备。
desc.en: A facility that extracts seeds from common crops.

desc.cn: 能够冲压各种容器的设备。
desc.en: A facility that produces various containers via stamp moulding.

delConfirmText.en: Retrieve this plot and lose the crops planted on it?

delConfirmText.en: Retrieve this plot and lose the crops planted on it?

delConfirmText.en: Retrieve this plot and lose the crops planted on it?

desc.cn: 此田块上按步骤进行精细种植，收获后可获得大量酮化灌木。
desc.en: To use this plot, follow the steps of fine cultivation and harvest the ripened crops to get plenty of Aketine.

delConfirmText.cn: 回收时种植作物无法获取，确认回收吗？

desc.cn: 此田块上按步骤进行精细种植，收获后可获得大量锦草，有较高概率额外获得蓬茸锦草。
desc.en: To use this plot, follow the steps of fine cultivation and harvest the ripened crops to get plenty of Jincao and a higher chance of Fluffed Jincao.

delConfirmText.cn: 回收时种植作物无法获取，确认回收吗？

desc.en: A simulated farm plot with faster growth rate than its real counterpart. To use this plot, follow the steps of fine cultivation and harvest the ripened crops to get plenty of Jincao.

desc.cn: 终末地的技术核心，一种大型能量利用设备组。
desc.en: The core of the Endfield AIC technology. It serves as the nexus of the AIC and its power grid.

desc.cn: 终末地技术核心的子版本，与母版本基本一致。
desc.en: A smaller version of the Endfield technological nexus. It works like the original Automation-Core.

desc.cn: 向固定位置喷洒液体的设备。
desc.en: A facility that sprays fluids in a fixed direction.

desc.cn: 向固定位置喷洒液体的设备。
desc.en: A facility that sprays fluids in a fixed direction.

desc.cn: 拥有数个格子的储物设备，在通电状态下可将其中物品转移至仓库，也可作为物品输出端直接用于工厂内部。
desc.en: A storage facility with several item storage slots. When powered, it can transfer items to the Depot. It can also be used as a point to unload items in the AIC.

desc.cn: 拥有数个格子的储物设备，在通电状态下可将其中物品转移至仓库，也可作为物品输出端直接用于工厂内部。
desc.en: A storage facility with several item storage slots. When powered, it can transfer items to the Depot. It can also be used as a point to unload items in the AIC.

desc.cn: 可以对粉末材料进行细致研磨处理的设备。
desc.en: A facility that performs fine grinding of powdered materials.

desc.cn: 用于封装部分能量元件的设备。
desc.en: A facility for packaging certain power components.

desc.cn: 可在80m范围内相连，架起索道的小型设备。
desc.en: A small zipline facility that can be connected to another zipline facility within an 80-meter radius to create a zipline.

desc.cn: 可在110m范围内相连，架起索道的大型设备。
desc.en: A large zipline facility that can be connected to another zipline facility within a 110-meter radius to create a zipline.

desc.cn: 可在80m范围内相连，架起索道的小型设备。
desc.en: A small zipline facility that can be connected to another zipline facility within an 80-meter radius to create a zipline.

desc.cn: 可选择物品从当地仓库取出的活动端口，只能贴靠仓库存取线放置。
desc.en: A placeable unloading point that transfers goods from a local depot into the AIC Factory. The Depot Unloader must be placed right next to the Depot Bus.

desc.cn: 能够将不同材料嵌合加工成装备原件的设备。
desc.en: A facility that laminates different materials together to create gear components.

desc.cn: 用于息壤相关产物合成的设备。
desc.en: A facility for making Xiranite-based products.
